# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(s, text_width = 10)
    wrapped = ""
    for word in split(s)
        if length(wrapped) + length(word) > text_width
            wrapped *= "\n" * word
        else
            wrapped *= " " * word
        end
    end
    return wrapped
end

# Example usage:
wrap_string("This is a very long sentence that needs to be wrapped.", 10) # =>
# This is
# a very
# long sentence
# that needs
# to be wrapped.
```
